databaseConfig.sql:
SELECT MS_THI_IRAI_STATUS_ID, ORDER_THI_IRAI_STATUS, SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO, USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, TS FROM MS_THI_IRAI_STATUS
ORDER BY MS_THI_IRAI_STATUS_ID

SELECT MS_THI_IRAI_STATUS_ID, ORDER_THI_IRAI_STATUS, SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO, USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, TS FROM MS_THI_IRAI_STATUS
where MS_THI_IRAI_STATUS_ID = :MS_THI_IRAI_STATUS_ID

INSERT INTO MS_THI_IRAI_STATUS( MS_THI_IRAI_STATUS_ID, ORDER_THI_IRAI_STATUS, SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :MS_THI_IRAI_STATUS_ID, :ORDER_THI_IRAI_STATUS, :SEND_FLAG, :VESSEL_ID, :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_THI_IRAI_STATUS SET ORDER_THI_IRAI_STATUS = :ORDER_THI_IRAI_STATUS, SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE MS_THI_IRAI_STATUS_ID = :MS_THI_IRAI_STATUS_ID AND TS = :TS
